ugh an integrator to convert it a triangle, so the voltage sweeps up smooth=

 Random mode is pr=
oblematic, unstable, and doesn't seem to work compared to the linear mode. =
Curious that it worked ok when that's all I had, now I can't get that mode =
to work with any of my new boxes. Random in the new box would not work at t=
he Stanely. Some have requested I leave it in, but it's just not worth the =
headache. 
 
 The system can be simplified, like leave out the mic amps, an=
d sound chamber, providing only a line output to go to a recorder, and spea=
ker driver. It's been my experience recently that spirits do not need the s=
ound chamber(aka echo box), and recording directly from a swept tuner works=
 just fine, and results in possibly clearer communications. There's less pl=
aces to introduce distortion and noise. Random results in broken up voices =
and phrases, and longer broadcast fragments. With good conditions, linear p=
rovides longer phrases, and more coherent messages. The "good conditions" b=
eing similar to radio propogation", in that sonmetimes it's good, and clear=
, and other times it's not. There seems to be a three month cycle in the pr=
opogation effects, but I have nothing documented. 
 
 There is yet another =
method of raw audio, use a foreign language shortwave broadcast that you do=
n't understand. Announce you're doing an EVP recording, and record some of =
the  broadcast.  On playback there should be coherent, and meaningful messa=
ges in your language.  Curiously, people that speak whatever language you u=
se don't hear the messages. You could even use stuff off the web, like Chin=

t's coherent phrases with meaning to the person doing the recording. I wond=
er if our minds don't use thiese raw audio methods as a psychic prop to get=
 the information to the surface?
